body_html: These are really terrific examples. I was thinking about rearranging them, but I do think they actually make a lot of sense where they are :) I was going to say something along the lines of including 'i have attended a Rails Girls or equivalent workshop' in Skill Level 1, and Skill Level 2 'I have been attending a study group for at least three months'... But these are very subjective and unclear... I like your stuff better :)

body: These are really terrific examples. I was thinking about rearranging them, but I do think they actually make a lot of sense where they are :) I was going to say something along the lines of including 'i have attended a Rails Girls or equivalent workshop' in Skill Level 1, and Skill Level 2 'I have been attending a study group for at least three months'... But these are very subjective and unclear... I like your stuff better :)
